prompt: Design a retro-styled QR code scanner page with a beige background. Include a square viewfinder with a thick black border and pixelated corners, centered on the screen. Place the title 'QR Code Scan' at the top in a bold, monospaced font in dark green. Below the viewfinder, add instructional text 'Position QR code here' in a smaller black font. Include a rectangular flashlight toggle button at the bottom with a green icon and 'Flash' label, using green as the accent color. Position a gallery button in the top-left corner with a black icon. Use a retro, pixelated aesthetic with moderate spacing.
